title: Invention Playlist: The Motion Picture, Part 1
itunes:title: Invention Playlist: The Motion Picture, Part 1
description:
As the Invention podcast ends, discussions of techno-history become part of STBYM again. So let's explore some past episodes of Robert and Joe's other series. Let's move on from the camera to motion pictures...

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
